title: The Worst Day Of The Worst Presidency In US History (Ep 1593)
description:
Joe Biden engaged in a grotesque attack on Donald Trump yesterday, in an effort to deflect from the blood on his hands. In this episode, I address the worst day of the worst presidency in US history. 

News Picks:
No, Joe Biden can’t blame Trump for the Afghanistan disaster. 

No, Joe Biden can’t blame Trump for the Afghanistan disaster. 

We gave the Taliban a list of Americans?

Elections have consequences.

January 6th committee makes a blacklist of conservative media. 

The three great tragedies of the covid crisis.


Bombshell study finds natural immunity is superior to vaccination. 


The CDC publishes a study showing no statistically significant effect of masks.

The Supreme Court hands Biden a stinging loss.
